Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is greyish in section, the interior is covered with a yellow-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a buff-coloured slip and remains of red-painted text or decoration.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394283) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394283)
